Package com.atakmap.android.metricreport

Class MetricReportMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.atakmap.android.metricreport.MetricReportMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, MapComponent, CrashListener
    public class MetricReportMapComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
implements android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, CrashListener
    Simple reporting capability for metrics within ATAK.
